name: Murder of the Magi
description:
Murder of the Magi

     In this puzzle-action adventure, you're put into the shoes of the librarian Zinta Zephyr, on a mission to scale his late brother's tower. You must claim his magical relics before they are stolen by his murderer, the evil sorcerer Mephis.

     Master the magics of fire and ice, and use these abilities in combination. You'll need them to solve the puzzles and defeat the foes that Mephis has put between you and him, as he waits at the top of the tower...

Keyboard Controls:

Walk............................  WASD
Aim..............................  Mouse
Jump.............................   Space
Interact......................   E
Swing Sword............   Middle Mouse
Fire Spell...................   Left Mouse                  (Once a Relic is obtained)
Disable Lock-On.....  Hold Right Mouse   (Once a Relic is obtained)
Swap Spell................   Q                                       (Once both Relics are obtained)
Pause Game.............   Escape/ P
Escape Game...........   F12

Gamepad Controls (Xbox):

Walk............................  Left Thumbstick
Aim..............................  Right Thumbstick
Jump.............................   A
Interact......................   X
Swing Sword............   Left Trigger
Fire Spell...................   Right Trigger             (Once a Relic is obtained)Disable Lock-On....   Hold Left Bumper  (Once a Relic is obtained)
Swap Spell................   Right Bumper          (Once both Relics are obtained)
Pause Game.............   Back
